refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: secmod.db is an NSS security modules database.

This is a BerkeyDB legacy database format. The recommende way of tracking security modules is the pkcs11.txt configuration file used in conjunction thew shared database format certificate and key dtabases.

refsection.title: Authors
refsection.para: The nss libraries were written and maintained by developers with Netscape, Red Hat, Sun, Oracle, Mozilla, and Google.
